Review.Contenu: I ordered from this company via Ebay.I ordered two things and these were sent separately. I only noticed that these were sent separately when they arrived.Then I was informed of the second shipment number, here it was said that the package had been lost. (This can be believed that the recipient was there and that a claim was submitted).Since I don't come from America myself, I agreed that I would pay the transport costs for the replacement delivery (mind you, I already paid about $ 100 for the label i provided).Now this seller has passed the case on Ebay, which reimbursed me the amount even though I actually wanted to have a replacement delivery.I still wanted the ordered goods at the gennant price, but I should pay almost $100 more now.After the eBay case was closed, they no longer answer, but my price offers at the original purchase price can still be rejected.HANDS OFF!

The seller canceled my orders without warning, explaining that I was using a forwarding service. While they disabled shipping to Ukraine, they are suggesting using their direct shipping services. Additionally, I faced a lot of trouble because we (in Ukraine) have monthly payment limits on cards; as a result, I paid for the goods, exceeded my card limit, and got the orders canceled.

I paid 300 dollars for a USED GTX1080TI-Turbo 11g and they sent me a faulty gpu.  The fan is so loud and never turns off - it is unusable.  I tried to contact them to get a resolution and they completely blew me off.  If you want an overpriced, faulty unit and 0 service, these are your guys.  I saw someone on here saying they just kept their money and didnt send anything.  wow.

Purchased an 8TB internal hard drive but it was faulty when it arrived. I was able to get the drive to power up but could not get it recognized in BIOS despite my best attempts. Now its an expensive paperweight.

Review.Titre: I contacted their support team multiple…
Review.Contenu: I contacted their support team multiple times but didn't get a response.

Review.Titre: They have my money and won’t send the…
Review.Contenu: They have my money and won’t send the dives! I have had to buy the drives from somewhere else and now I’m stuck trying to get my money refunded!

Shipping took forever and I assume it's because they were testing.Parts missing from product even though they have them in stock.Parts damaged, probably during shipping but that reflects on their packaging.Product didn't seem like it was tested much other than power on though, check the product review.
prompt shipment, and good support by sales dept.

Review.Titre: Slow to ship but, everything else A++
Review.Contenu: These folks know how to package hard drives well and securely. 0 drives arrived DOA. Customer service in regards to price matching their eBay shop for a bulk order was A+ as well. My only complaint is that it took a week for them to ship my order. Sure amazon has spoiled us all with fast shipping but c'mon 3 days tops Unix Surplus for an order that does not involve a whole server build (s) and testing. I ordered on an early Monday morning and the order shipped until Friday. According to the testing verification stickers on them, they were all tested on the same day so it does not appear that testing the drives is the culprit to this delay. Overall however, a definite positive experience and will definitely return for more.

Review.Titre: Overall Happy with our First Purchase
Review.Contenu: They didn't have the items we paid for in stock, but called us to get approval to provide another of a different brand.  This process took several days and then the item was shipped.  This process took far longer than expected.  Therefore, minus one star for time of purchase to actually receiving the item being several days longer than expected.  However, once the hardware was installed, it worked perfectly.  Overall, happy with the product received and would buy from them again, provided we didn't the need something asap.

I keep coming back because prices are reasonable for their equipment.Mostly, the description of the product is accurate. However, one time I received a server that had a HBA card with a bad port. They made it right by sending out a replacement card.Also, they gave me a system with the correct amount of RAM. But when I tried to add more RAM sticks to it, it didn't work because one of the motherboard slots was dead. It ended up being ok because I put the new DIMMs in a non-standard slot, which worked. But just know that what the equipment is rated for in the posting may be its limit. Upgrading beyond that is not supported and the company will not automatically provide the results of their own internal test reports.

In testing the X9SRL-F, I thought the motherboard had bad PCIe slots. Unfortunately, I was not able to test every slot until after the 30 day return period.Still, I opened an RMA to see what could be done. There was no response, not even to say that the 30-day period had passed. This was caused by a misconfiguration of their website that sent the RMA request to the wrong place. For this, they get dinged one star.But, the motherboard was actually functional, which I determined after I got another X9SRL-F that showed the same symptoms. It turns out there is a very subtle bug which is only exposed if you:1. Have more than 2 PCIe cards installed.2. At least one of the PCIe cards is fairly modern (like an NVMe adapter) compared to the motherboard.3. Got unlucky with the reset of the CMOS.#3 is the key, where if you clear the CMOS, the default for Active State Power Management (ASPM) is "Disabled", but sometimes it doesn't quite take, and it is enabled, even though it shows as not. With ASPM enabled, the other two parts of the bug work together to make the motherboard extremely unreliable, and the slots farthest from the power supply (the x4 slots) are the most affected.The workaround for the bug is to enable ASPM, save and reset, then manually disable it and save and reset, which causes the setting to correctly disabled. I don't fault UNIXSurplus for not hitting this extremely rare bug when they test, plus it still doesn't mean the motherboard is truly bad.
Took a while to make contact with a customer service representative,however once contact was made they were unhurried and knowledgeable about my issue and the products available to solve same.

I've ordered from UnixSurplus a few times over the years and every interaction has been positive. Very reasonable prices on surplus and end of live hardware. Quick turn around on shipping. In previous interactions I've spoken to one of the specialists and they were very professional and helpful. I haven't had to used it but the return guarantee offers piece of mind.

Review.Titre: I need a really oddball part for a…
Review.Contenu: I need a really oddball part for a server project, they had it.

I've made multiple orders with UnixSurplus, and plan on there being many more. Everything is VERY fairly priced (especially the hard drive offerings!), and customer service is top-notch. It's very refreshing to see a company treating their customers well and proper, rather than just trying to squeeze the most profit out of every one. Looking forward to shopping here for years to come!

Review.Titre: I got a great deal on 3 refurbished…
Review.Contenu: I got a great deal on 3 refurbished server. I installed Citrix Xen Server on them and are running great now.
Easily able to find what I want, More or less right prices. Same day dispatch. Multiple mails for info.

Review.Titre: Called to check on order on a Saturday
Review.Contenu: Called to check on order on a Saturday, and actually talked to someone. He checked on the order, realized that there had been an oversite, and got it resolved. Drives were shipped out Monday afternoon, and I received them Saturday afternoon (delay from UPS due to adverse weather). Got the drives swapped into the trays that my old Dell server uses, and they are working perfectly. Drives came wrapped in anti-static bag and bubble wrap bags and encased in more bubble wrap in the box. The even have labels stating the power on hours. 10/10 would buy from UNIXSurplus again.

Review.Titre: Great resource for server parts and used servers!
Review.Contenu: I have ordered from UNIXSurplus multiple times and so far have been pleased with the condition of the items received.

I love Unix Surplus.They provide personal service, and professional expertise.I’ve ordered multiple systems from them, and  they make sure each system is configed correctly, POSTS and boots.IMHO their systems are BETTER than new, because they only sell the surviving used systems ( new too).  These used systems have been worm in, and never break for me.Thank you Unix Surplus, I will always come to you for my business!

First time ordering from company through their website.Packing and tracking were excellent, the only slight downside was it took a few days to get shipped out the door. Note that it was not a problem for me as it was not an urgent order so keep that in mind when ordering.

I’ve used UnixSurplus for a variety of purchases. Most notably the r720xd which I still use in my homelab. It was a first time enterprise hardware purchase and they provided technical services alongside the purchase of the machine which included flashing the HBA for ZFS and providing ease of mind with the purchase by verifying my target platform FreeNAS would function. Since then I’ve bought a variety of products such as RAM and NICs. At the time I wasn’t as well versed in the hardware and ecosystems, and they certainly provided the expertise to help with that. The packing was excellent and ensured a safe and secure delivery.

Review.Titre: I cannot recommend them highly enough
Review.Contenu: I cannot recommend them highly enough. These guys are the epitome of professionalism – patient, thorough, and always committed to delivering the best. My order arrived on time and was well-packaged, demonstrating their meticulous attention to detail. What sets them apart, however, is their genuine willingness to go the extra mile for their customers. It's not just about completing a transaction for them; it's about ensuring complete customer satisfaction, every time. If you're looking for a reliable and dedicated team, look no further!

Review.Titre: Satisfied with purchase, delivery process and merchandise.
Review.Contenu: Item arrived promptly;  excellent protective packaging and in good shipping container.  Motherboard in excellent condition and appears new.Pre-shipment call and email to verify destination address was a good idea.Had a problem due to a faulty memory module but Nick mailed out a replacement.  Everything satisfactory now.

I've had many transactions with UNIXSurplus, both direct and through eBay, for complete servers as well as components.  John, Tay, and especially Justin have all provided excellent customer service and I have been happy with all equipment received.  Everything I have ordered was ACTUALLY ready-for-reuse and was clearly tested prior to shipping.  The pricing tends to be reasonable and competitive, and shipping might cost extra, but all equipment I bought was packed VERY well and actually shipping time was minimal.

Review.Titre: awesome prices and they called me to…
Review.Contenu: awesome prices and they called me to make sure i did make the purchase that surprised me as that is an extra level of security that they dont have to do the thing i got was only like 2 bucks as well
Perhaps my favorite server supplier! Lots of great deals and they work so well with us! Always happy when boxes come from UnixSurplus!
Very friendly staff, answered all my questions & concerns. First time buying from them would definitely recommend them!

Review.Titre: Unix surplus has always been a great…
Review.Contenu: Unix surplus has always been a great company to work with. They have excellent products and great prices and superb customer service.
i ordered it on the 20th. tracking showed it arrived in norfolk today.
Great customer service by Nick, as usual. He is really an asset to UNIXSurplus.
Great price, fast shipping, well packed and most of all exactly as described. My new go to place.
The guy was personable and to the point and pleasant to talk to, he answered my questions.

Review.Titre: Part worked perfectly and they quickly…
Review.Contenu: Part worked perfectly and they quickly handled any issues I had.
Excellent communication, very fast time to ship after order, surprisingly good packaging of the products in general
Product shipped promptly and worked as advertised. 5/5.

Review.Titre: Fast delivery and the CPU was spot on.
These guys are the best surplus outfit…
Review.Contenu: These guys are the best surplus outfit in the US.
Great condition of items. Great price.
good prices 'fast'shipping will buy again for sure....
Works and as delivered timely
I have used this store for a long time, and I love it!
Good products, great price.
